class.name: MultivariateNormalDistributionTest

javadoc.text: Test the ability of the distribution to report its mean value parameter.
Test the ability of the distribution to report its covariance matrix parameter.
Test the accuracy of sampling from the distribution.
Test the accuracy of the distribution when calculating densities.

method.name: testDensities
method.comment: From dmvnorm function in R 2.15 CRAN package Mixtools v0.4.5

javadoc.text: Test the accuracy of the distribution when calculating densities.
